snippet: After months of fighting and a seemingly inexhaustible stream of sharp-tongued letters, Carl C. Icahn is ending his battle against Dell’s proposed sale to its founder.
abstract: After months of fighting and a seemingly inexhaustible stream of sharp-tongued letters, Carl C. Icahn is ending his battle against Dell’s proposed sale to its founder.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Icahn Calls Off Fight Over Dell's Sale
